class certis.constants.OrderSide[source]¶

Bases: object

OrderSide Object

LONG: betting for upside SHORT: betting for downside

LONG = 1¶
SHORT = -1¶
SIDES = [-1, 1]¶
class certis.constants.OrderType[source]¶

OrderType Object. Supported types are
